item.description: We’ll dance the night away from 8 pm to 12 am to music of our DJ Tasteful Productions. There will be a delicious buffet 8 to 9:30 pm to enjoy. Bring your friends with you. Dress to impress and door prizes. State at the admissions table that you are from “Life Begins @ 50” or “The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!” and pay $15, after 9:30 pm pay $10.  Sponsored by Singles Social Connections. For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I 84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end and turn right, at 2nd light facility on right. Parking both sides of building.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Singles March Dance
